about_the_game:
Add K/DA - "MORE" to your song library!

Song Description:
“MORE” - K/DA (feat. Madison Beer, (G)I-DLE, Lexie Liu, Jaira Burns, Seraphine)
K/DA returned for the Opening Ceremony 2020 World Cup Finals, inviting players to “ascend the throne” with a cinematic featuring League champions Ahri, Evelynn, Kai’Sa and Akali.

Music Pack Description:
It’s time to chase your legend as Synth Riders brings you the League of Legends Music Pack. Featuring music created for “League of Legends”, one of the most widely played video games of all time with an Esports scene to match, this pack features songs from Riot Games’ own supergroups K/DA and True Damage alongside two epic League event anthems that will inspire you towards victory!

“League of Legends” Music Pack features:
  • League of Legends - "Legends Never Die" + Experience
  • League of Legends - "Awaken"
  • K/DA - "POP/STARS"
  • K/DA - "MORE"
  • True Damage - "GIANTS"

Synth Riders continues to build the diversity of its musical offerings in this pack. Fans of the R&B attitude and pop style of K-pop can now dance to the K/DA-inspired choreographies for smash hits “POP/STARS” and “MORE”, while lovers of hip-hop can feel the power and flow of every word of “GIANTS”. Grand cinematic anthems from some of League’s biggest events complete the pack, with Valerie Broussard calling players to battle in “Awaken”, while Against The Current remind us all that “Legends Never Die”.

Included in this pack is a Synth Riders Experience for “Legends Never Die”, inspired by the gameplay and characters of League of Legends. With visuals synchronized to the music, Synth Riders offer fans of the game a uniquely immersive way to feel the heat of battle and re-live the song’s performance inspired by the 2017 World Finals Opening Ceremony featuring the Elder Dragon.

Add K/DA - "MORE" to your song library!

Song Description:
“MORE” - K/DA (feat. Madison Beer, (G)I-DLE, Lexie Liu, Jaira Burns, Seraphine)
K/DA returned for the Opening Ceremony 2020 World Cup Finals, inviting players to “ascend the throne” with a cinematic featuring League champions Ahri, Evelynn, Kai’Sa and Akali.

Music Pack Description:
It’s time to chase your legend as Synth Riders brings you the League of Legends Music Pack. Featuring music created for “League of Legends”, one of the most widely played video games of all time with an Esports scene to match, this pack features songs from Riot Games’ own supergroups K/DA and True Damage alongside two epic League event anthems that will inspire you towards victory!

“League of Legends” Music Pack features:
  • League of Legends - "Legends Never Die" + Experience
  • League of Legends - "Awaken"
  • K/DA - "POP/STARS"
  • K/DA - "MORE"
  • True Damage - "GIANTS"

Synth Riders continues to build the diversity of its musical offerings in this pack. Fans of the R&B attitude and pop style of K-pop can now dance to the K/DA-inspired choreographies for smash hits “POP/STARS” and “MORE”, while lovers of hip-hop can feel the power and flow of every word of “GIANTS”. Grand cinematic anthems from some of League’s biggest events complete the pack, with Valerie Broussard calling players to battle in “Awaken”, while Against The Current remind us all that “Legends Never Die”.

With visuals synchronized to the music, Synth Riders offer fans of the game a uniquely immersive way to feel the heat of battle and re-live the song’s performance inspired by the 2017 World Finals Opening Ceremony featuring the Elder Dragon.
name: Synth Riders: K/DA - "MORE"

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Sandy Bridge or equivalent
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or equivalent
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • Sound Card: Any

supported_languages: English, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
